short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension to help find food substitutes for any diet/restriction

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clove helps you save and find recipes based on ingredients you have and modify any recipe to any dietary restriction, number of calories, and budget.
